HomePage.title: Arch AI
HomePage.description: AI-Powered Architectural Visualization for Architects, Interior Designers & Urban Planners

hero.title: Turn Sketches into Stunning Renders
hero.description: Transform architectural sketches, white models, and floor plans into photorealistic visualizations. Powered by advanced AI with 9 professional styles and 26+ templates.

showcase.title: Templates
showcase.subtitle: Professional Visualization Templates
showcase.description: 26+ scene-based templates covering the entire architectural design workflow

style-transfer.title: Style Transfer
style-transfer.description: Transform architectural images into different styles - modern, traditional, or artistic

model-render.title: Model to Render
model-render.description: Convert white models and block models into photorealistic visualizations

floor-plan.title: Floor Plan
floor-plan.description: Generate colored floor plans and functional zoning diagrams

facade.title: Facade Design
facade.description: Create facade designs, material replacements, and renovation concepts

interior.title: Interior Design
interior.description: Generate interior perspectives and room visualizations

analysis.title: Analysis Diagrams
analysis.description: Create Sasaki-style analysis, sunlight studies, and circulation diagrams

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Professional Visualization Tools
features.description: Everything architects and designers need in one powerful AI platform

item-1.title: 9 Architectural Styles
item-1.description: From Modern Minimalist to Parametric, Brutalist to Watercolor - choose the perfect style for your project

item-2.title: Smart Image Enhancement
item-2.description: AI-powered prompt enhancement with professional architectural terminology for better results

item-3.title: Multiple Aspect Ratios
item-3.description: Support for 1:1, 16:9, 4:3, 3:4, and 9:16 - perfect for any presentation format

item-4.title: Edit & Iterate
item-4.description: Upload reference images and edit with natural language to refine your visualizations

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your workflow

item-1.question: What types of architectural visualizations can I create?
item-1.answer: Arch AI supports style transfers, white model to render conversions, floor plan coloring, facade design, section diagrams, analysis diagrams (Sasaki style, sunlight, circulation), interior perspectives, and more.

item-2.question: What image formats are supported?
item-2.answer: We support PNG, JPEG, WebP, and GIF for input images. Output images are generated in high-quality PNG format.

item-3.question: How do credits work?
item-3.answer: Each generation costs credits based on the model used. Nano Banana uses 1 credit, Nano Banana Pro uses 3 credits. You can purchase credit packs or subscribe for monthly credits.

item-4.question: Can I use the generated images commercially?
item-4.answer: Yes! All images generated with Arch AI can be used for commercial projects, client presentations, and publications.

item-5.question: Need help or have questions?
item-5.answer: Contact our support team at support@nanobanana.com - we're here to help you create stunning visualizations.
